info.title: Salesforce
info.description: The Salesforce Connector provides an API to work with Salesforce objects.

get.description: This operation gets the object metadata for a Salesforce object type.

post.description: Creates a job, which represents a bulk operation (and associated data) that is sent to Salesforce for asynchronous processing. Provide job data via an Upload Job Data request.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for new job, such as object to modify and operation type.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Parameters for new job, such as object to modify and operation type.

parameters.name: $apply
parameters.description: A sequence of OData aggregation transformations

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: An ODATA orderBy query for specifying the order of entries.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Total number of entries to retrieve (default = all).

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of entries to skip (default = 0).

post.description: This operation creates a record and allows null values.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Specific fields to retrieve from entries (default = all).

get.description: This operation lists the available Salesforce object types.
This operation retrieves external ID fields of Salesforce object type.

get.summary: Get a Record by External ID
get.description: This operation retrieves a record using an external ID.

parameters.name: externalIdField
parameters.description: Field marked as external ID field on Salesforce object.

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: External ID of the record to retrieve.

patch.summary: Insert or Update (Upsert) a Record by External ID
patch.description: This operation inserts or updates (upserts) a record using an external ID.

parameters.name: externalIdField
parameters.description: Field marked as external ID field on Salesforce object.

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: External ID of the record to upsert.

get.description: This operation gets records of a certain Salesforce object type like 'Leads'.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: An ODATA orderBy query for specifying the order of entries.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Total number of entries to retrieve (default = all).

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of entries to skip (default = 0).

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Specific fields to retrieve from entries (default = all).

operations.description: This operation allows to search on Salesforce Account objects. Available properties for Account objects are: Name, Phone, Industry, AnnualRevenue, OwnerId. Schema for Account object can be found on the response schema for this API.

properties.name: default
properties.value: Name, Phone, Industry, AnnualRevenue, OwnerId, Id

operations.description: This operation allows to search on Salesforce Case objects. Available properties for Case objects are: CaseNumber, ContactId, AccountId, Status, Subject, OwnerId. Schema for Case object can be found on the response schema for this API.

properties.name: default
properties.value: CaseNumber, ContactId, AccountId, Status, Subject, OwnerId

operations.description: This operation allows to search on Salesforce Contact objects. Available properties for Contact objects are: Name, Phone, Email, Title. Schema for Contact object can be found on the response schema for this API.

This operation allows to search on Salesforce Lead objects. Available properties for Lead objects are: Name, Title, Company, Phone, Email, Status, CreatedDate. Schema for Lead object can be found on the response schema for this API.

properties.name: default
properties.value: Name, Title, Company, Phone, Email, Status, CreatedDate

operations.description: This operation allows to search on Salesforce Opportunity objects. Available properties for Opportunity objects are: Name, StageName, Amount, Probability, CloseDate, OwnerId, CreatedDate. Schema for Opportunity object can be found on the response schema for this API.

properties.name: default
properties.value: AccountId, Name, StageName, Amount, CloseDate, Probability

get.description: Get a list of all jobs

post.description: Creates a job, which represents a bulk operation (and associated data) that is sent to Salesforce for asynchronous processing. Provide job data via an Upload Job Data request.

put.description: Uploads data for a job using CSV data.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a job.

patch.description: Closes or aborts a job. Use UploadComplete to close a job, or Aborted to abort a job. If you close a job, Salesforce queues the job and uploaded data for processing, and you cant add any additional job data. If you abort a job, the job does not get queued or processed.

delete.description: Deletes a job. To be deleted, a job must have a state of UploadComplete, JobComplete, Aborted, or Failed.

get.description: Retrieves a list of records based on the result type for a completed job.
Get information about the user currently signed in with the connector
Execute the specified SOSL search qyery

post.description: Construct a Salesforce REST API request to invoke

parameters.name: Uri
parameters.description: The full or relative URI. Example of relative URI: /services/data/v41.0/sobjects/account

parameters.name: ContentType
parameters.description: The content-type header for the body (default is application/json).

parameters.name: CustomHeader1
parameters.description: Custom header 1. Specify in format: header-name: header-value

parameters.name: CustomHeader2
parameters.description: Custom header 2. Specify in format: header-name: header-value

parameters.name: CustomHeader3
parameters.description: Custom header 3. Specify in format: header-name: header-value

parameters.name: CustomHeader4
parameters.description: Custom header 4. Specify in format: header-name: header-value

parameters.name: CustomHeader5
parameters.description: Custom header 5. Specify in format: header-name: header-value

object.description: The object type for the data being processed.

operation.description: The processing operation for the job.

columnDelimiter.description: The column delimiter used for CSV job data.

externalIdFieldName.description: The external ID field in the object being updated. Only needed for upsert operations. Field values must also exist in CSV job data.

lineEnding.description: The line ending used for CSV job data, marking the end of a data row.

contentType.description: The content type for the job.

object.description: The object type for the data being processed.

operation.description: The processing operation for the job.

columnDelimiter.description: The column delimiter used for CSV job data.

externalIdFieldName.description: The external ID field in the object being updated. Only needed for upsert operations. Field values must also exist in CSV job data.

lineEnding.description: The line ending used for CSV job data, marking the end of a data row.

contentType.description: The content type for the job.

apiVersion.description: The API version that the job was created in.

concurrencyMode.description: The concurrency mode for the job.

contentUrl.description: The URL to use for Upload Job Data requests for this job. Only valid if the job is in 'Open' state.

createdById.description: The ID of the user who created the job.

createdDate.description: The date and time in the UTC time zone when the job was created.

state.description: The current state of processing for the job.

systemModstamp.description: Date and time in the UTC time zone when the job finished.

ExecuteSoqlQueryParameters.description: Input body for Execute Soql Query operation

query.description: SOQL Query text. Dynamic parameters can be specified using '@paramName' syntax.

parameters.description: SOQL Query dynamic parameters. Key is parameter name (without '@' at sign), value is parameter value.

Name.description: Name of the external ID field, used at runtime.

DisplayName.description: Display name of the external ID field.

ExternalIdFieldsList.description: Represents a list of external ID fields.

PassThroughNativeQuery.description: static schema for pass-through native query execution

Name.description: The name of the table. The name is used at runtime.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the table.

DynamicProperties.description: Additional table properties provided by the connector to the clients.

serverPagingOptions.description: List of supported server-driven paging capabilities

filterable.description: Indicates whether this table has filterable columns

selectable.description: Indicates whether this table has selectable columns

sortable.description: Indicates whether this table has sortable columns

ascendingOnlyProperties.description: List of properties which support ascending order only

searchRecords.description: A list of search records returned by an SOSL search query

metadata.description: Metadata of the result returned from the query

SearchRecordObject.description: Individual record returned by SOSL query

url.description: API path that can be used to the retrieve the object
